detail_desc: Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a detachable, padded, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Zipped front pockets, inner ribbing and a tab with a hook and loop fastening at the cuffs, and folded seams. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a detachable, padded, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Zipped front pockets, inner ribbing and a tab with a hook and loop fastening at the cuffs, and folded seams. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a detachable, padded, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Zipped front pockets, inner ribbing and a tab with a hook and loop fastening at the cuffs, and folded seams. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Zipped front pockets, inner ribbing and a tab with a hook and loop fastening at the cuffs, and folded seams. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Knee-length dress in airy mesh with beaded appliqués, short sleeves with a frill trim and a seam with a double frill trim at the hem. Jersey underdress.
V-neck jumpsuit in airy crêpe fabric with a sewn-in wrapover and seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt. Short sleeves with a decorative tie at the cuffs and wide, ankle-length legs.
Jersey top with short, printed cap sleeves and gathered flounces at the hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front in a relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front in a relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless, V-neck top in a cotton weave with hole embroidery, narrow shoulder straps and flounces at the front.
Sleeveless, V-neck top in a cotton weave with hole embroidery, narrow shoulder straps and flounces at the front.
Sleeveless, V-neck top in a cotton weave with hole embroidery, narrow shoulder straps and flounces at the front.
Swimming trunks with an elasticated drawstring waist, print motif and lined front.
Oversized shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and low dropped shoulders. Long sleeves with a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with hard-worn details and a print motif on one leg. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Canvas hi-tops with a hook and loop fastening and lacing at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Canvas hi-tops with a hook and loop fastening and lacing at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Top in UV-protective fabric with a print motif on the front, turtle neck and long raglan sleeves. Slightly longer at the back. UPF 50.

Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a wide raw-edge neckline, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Padded jacket in wind- and water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, fleece-lined hood and zip and wind flap with a hook and loop fastener down the front. Zipped chest pocket, elasticated cuffs, reflective details and a fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Padded outdoor trousers in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with a zip fly and hook and loop fastening, elasticated hems and an elastic strap under the feet. The trousers are in a slightly higher cut at the back with elastication at the waist and have elastic braces with a hook and loop fastening. Reflective details and a fleece lining. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
